backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Game type and CRUD operations (add, get, delete, list, filter by category, increment play count, get most popular) backed by a Map, with blob storage mixin included.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a single feature (rewriting RetroBowlGame.tsx into a full Retro Bowl clone) to its target file, component dependencies, and test ID REQ-59.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a pre-built reference for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/components/utilities entry with OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, border, chart, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React app titled 'Random Arcade', importing Exo 2 and Chakra Petch from Google Fonts and mounting the app via /src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with a root layout (Navigation + Footer), an index route for HomePage, and a dynamic /game/$title route for GamePage, wrapped in a React Query provider.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedGameHero: Hero section component displaying a featured game's thumbnail, title, description, play count, category badge, and a neon 'Play Now' button with gradient overlays.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer showing the Random Arcade brand, dynamic copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM parameters derived from the current hostname.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Linked game card component rendering a thumbnail with hover play-button overlay, title, category badge, and play count, with neon glow colors keyed to game category.
frontend/src/components/games/AsteroidsG: Implements a canvas-based Asteroids game with ship movement, shooting, asteroid splitting, collision detection, score tracking, and neon visual styling.
frontend/src/components/games/DinoRunner: Implements a canvas-based endless runner game where a dino jumps over procedurally spawned cacti, with increasing speed, collision detection, and score tracking.
frontend/src/components/games/MemoryMatc: Implements a React-based memory card matching game with 8 symbol pairs, flip/match logic, move counter, elapsed timer, and win detection.
frontend/src/components/games/Minesweepe: Implements a 9x9 Minesweeper game with mine placement on first click, flood-fill reveal, flagging, win/loss detection, and an elapsed timer.
frontend/src/components/games/PongGame.t: Implements a two-player canvas-based Pong game with keyboard controls, ball physics, paddle collision, score tracking, and a first-to-7 win condition.
frontend/src/components/games/RetroBowlG: A full-featured retro-style American football game rendered on an HTML5 canvas, implementing game phases, player/defender AI, passing, running, field goals, scoring, and HUD display.
frontend/src/components/games/SixSevenGa: Empty file with no content or implementation.
Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/components/games/SpaceInvad: Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/components/games/SwordsAndS: A turn-based gladiator combat game rendered on a canvas with attack, block, and special move actions, featuring shake/flash animations, HP tracking, and round progression.
frontend/src/components/games/TetrisGame: Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/components/games/TungTungGa: Empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/components/games/WhackAMole: A 3x3 grid Whack-a-Mole game with a 30-second timer, randomly popping moles, click-to-whack scoring, and idle/playing/over states.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Renders a sticky top navigation bar with a logo linking to the home page and a 'Game Library' nav link, styled with neon colors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching games (all, by category, most popular), incrementing play counts, and adding new games via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives, defines a dark cyberpunk/neon design system via CSS custom properties (oklch colors), and adds utility classes for neon text glows, neon borders, grid backgrounds, scanlines, and font families (Chakra Petch, Exo 2).
frontend/src/lib/seedGames.ts: Defines a list of 8 seed games (Whack-a-Mole, Dino Runner, Pong, etc.) and exports a `seedInitialGames` function that checks existing backend games and adds any missing ones to avoid duplicates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Route page that maps URL title params to specific game components via GAME_MAP, increments the play count on mount, and renders the matched game or a 404 state with a back link.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that seeds initial games on actor load, displays a featured hero for Dino Runner, renders category filter buttons, and shows a responsive grid of GameCard components with loading skeletons and empty states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with neon color palette, custom fonts (Chakra Petch, Exo 2), neon box-shadow variants, and keyframe animations (neon-pulse, float, accordion), plus the tailwindcss-animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 37) tracking the platform summary, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features for the web-based multi-game arcade platform.
